EasyMode.title: Highlight Important Memory Cubes
EasyMode.tooltip: There is a lot of text in Magistarium! If you don't want to read it all, this setting will highlight Memory Cubes that grant a ship log entry with an orange outline, instead of the default white. (Does not apply if you've already read the cube this cycle, nor does it affect text from sources other than Memory Cubes.)

FocusOnCubes.title: Follow Memory Cubes As They Move
FocusOnCubes.tooltip: Is the bobbing of the Memory Cubes annoying you, but you don't want to Freeze Time While Talking To Others? This will keep the camera still when you interact with them.

VaNotifications.title: Voice-Acted Magistarium Notifications
VaNotifications.tooltip: Should the Magistarium notifications be voice-acted? You will only hear them in the vacinity of the Magistarium. 'Only if VA Mod Present' means that the voice-acting will only be active if you also have the Voice Acting Mod from the mod database installed.
